search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Capsule CRM (capsulecrm.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Capsule CRM is [https://capsulecrm.com/pricing/](https://capsulecrm.com/pricing/).

extracted_content.content:
![Image 1](https://capsulecrm.com/icons/signup/starter.svg)

Starter

Effective lead nurturing plus premium integrations for efficient, centralized processes.

Per user, per month.  
Billed Annually.

Free 14-day trial. No card required.

**Our Starter plan gives you:**

*   30,000 Contacts
*   Email Templates
    
    Avoid writing the same email over and over with a bank of reusable templates, ready to edit and send
    
*   AI-Powered Email Assistant
    
    Use AI prompts to generate high-converting emails at the click of a button
    
*   Shared Mailbox
    
    Connect a shared email inbox to enable multiple team members to respond from the same account e.g. sales@, support@, info@
    
*   Basic Reporting
*   Premium Integrations
    
    Access direct integrations with tools like Xero, Zendesk and Import2
    

Most Popular![Image 2](https://capsulecrm.com/icons/signup/growth.svg)

Growth

Scale your business with multiple sales pipelines and project boards. Boost your productivity with workflow automations and team organization.

Per user, per month.  
Billed Annually.

Free 14-day trial. No card required.

**Everything in Starter, plus:**

*   60,000 Contacts
*   Workflow Automations
    
    Define repeatable sales processes by configuring a series of tasks, email notifications or stage changes within pipeline/project boards
    
*   Advanced Sales Reporting
    
    More in depth reports so you can get visibility on your sales forecast, where you are losing the most sales and how active your team is.
    
*   Multiple Sales Pipelines
*   Multiple Project Boards
*   Project Management
    
    Manage client delivery and other activities via kanban-style project boards
    
*   Team & Access Controls
*   Business Enrichment
    
    Automatically populates company records with the latest information on revenue, headcount, location, industries and more
    

![Image 3](https://capsulecrm.com/icons/signup/advanced.svg)

Advanced

Find up-to-date contact and account information for better targeting. Plus even more Custom Fields and Tags to tailor Capsule to fit your business.

Per user, per month.  
Billed Annually.

Free 14-day trial. No card required.

**Everything in Growth, plus:**

*   120,000 Contacts
*   Contact Enrichment
    
    Populates contact records with the latest data to help build a complete profile of your contacts - including job title, seniority, LinkedIn profiles and missing contact information.
    

![Image 4](https://capsulecrm.com/icons/signup/ultimate.svg)

Ultimate

Ideal for scaling teams with 5+ users. You'll get your own account manager, implementation support, and custom training.

Per user, per month.  
Billed Annually.

Free 14-day trial. No card required.

**Everything in Advanced, plus:**

*   240,000 Contacts
*   Dedicated Account Manager
*   Custom Training
*   Ongoing Priority Support

Leave the spreadsheets behind for a straightforward yet sophisticated CRM. Up to 2 users and 250 contacts.

![Image 14: Transpond mock UI](https://capsulecrm.com/static/transpond-callout-4667156f70c12c851432bdb798321a20.png)

### Marketing add-on

Align your sales and marketing activities with our Marketing add-on. Deliver engaging email campaigns, view key contact information in one place and create powerful automations.

4.7 rating300+ reviews

The award-winning CRM platform
------------------------------

![Image 15](blob:http://localhost/d1c3912d6e6105b83dbe04e4affa7277)![Image 16](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/poftgen7/production/df3f70a1dee149307d3490dea276c84aae011ed9-1400x283.png?w=1400&h=283&q=75&fit=max&auto=format)

"Our usage of Capsule over the last 18 months has matured and so our success rate has grown alongside it. In the last 12 months, we’ve seen a 48% increase in conversion."

Improve your customer relationships and increase sales with Capsule. Sign up and start using Capsule in minutes. Free forever and pro accounts available.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is per user per month, billed annually. Free tier is available with limited features.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Basic CRM features for small teams.
Effective lead nurturing plus premium integrations.
Scale your business with advanced tools.
Ideal for scaling teams with dedicated support.
